article.name: photokinesis
article.contents:
--- class: Psion name: Photokinesis title: Photokinesis school: Metacreativity rank: 1 type: Assault and Utility brief: Create an astral construct in the form of a weapon with which you are proficient. ---
Create or modify light. You can bend light, make lasers, etc. Higher rank, use higher frequencies such as x-ray and gamma radiation.
